pages.text: The $(thing)Charger$() is used to charge $(l:ae2:catalog/chargable)various AE2 items$(/l), and for some crafting.  Notably it is used to craft the $(l:ae2:getting_started/compass)Meteorite Compass$(/l) and $(l:ae2:getting_started/certus#charged)Charged Certus Quartz$(/l).$(br2)The $(thing)Charger$() accepts most $(l:ae2:concepts/ae_power)external forms of power$(/l), or can be powered manually using a $(thing)Wooden Crank$().
